steps.summary: DataManager and CacheKeys imported successfully. CacheKeys provides methods: etf_holdings, insights, ipo_calendar, market, news_sentiment, parse, pattern, treasury
Redis cache keys verified: insights:ai_basket_symbols, insights:ai_sector_risk:latest - follows CacheKeys.insights() pattern
Daily OHLCV cache working: First request = Cache MISS (fetched from API), Second request = Cache HIT (price:AAPL:1d:1mo). TTL=3600s.
Intraday data (5m) IS cached with shorter TTL (300s) vs daily (3600s). This is correct behavior - real-time data needs frequent refreshes while daily can be cached longer.
